game.name: Lone Survivors
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Cut through hundreds of monsters and survive against all odds in this fantasy survivors-like top-down action game! Level up, unlock abilities, and defeat bosses with a wide arsenal of weapons and magic.
